name: National Council for Science and the Environment
display_name: National Council for Science and the Environment
description: The National Council for Science and the Environment works with 160 Affiliate member universities and colleges to advance environmental education. Our work includes a number on OCW projects including CAMEL (a Climate Change OCW initiative at www.camelclimatechange.org); the Encyclopedia of Earth (www.eoearth.org); and, others. Our member schools are advancing many online education initiatives, many utilizing OCW efforts.
